favourite.article:
This is a great song. I like the music for this one. If I am full and think I’m rich, Empty, You’ll send me away; Continually I’m hungry, Lord. My heart on You will stay.
I pray my heart will always stay on You Lord, and, if I am too satisfied with worldly things, take them from me and help me set my heart on You. Help us keep our hearts set on You, there are so many things our there demanding our attention. Thank You Lord.
Amen.

Hallelujah! This is what I need. Make me hungry seeker, Lord. Give me such a heart that longs after You so desperately. And keep my gaze fixed on You alone regardless of the circumstances, none other to look at but at You! Lord, make all your saints hungry seekers of You!
As the hart pants after the streams of water, so my soul pants for You, O God. My soul thirsts for God, for the living God. Psalms 42:1-2a
O Lord Jesus! thank You that You're always available to us! When we are hungry You are there to feed us...Lord, You are my life. Without You I am nothing. Make me always hungry for You...

Oh, Lord Jesus keep me hungry longing for your rich supply! Oh all the days of my life full of you lord that you become in me an overflow. Our lord you are our life, our reality we have nothing apart from thee.
